SELECT wt.`name` as item_name, wt.`price` as item_price, TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, un.`in_hospital_time`, un.`out_hospital_time`) AS item_amount
FROM unhospitalized un LEFT JOIN ward w ON un.`wid`= w.`wid` LEFT JOIN ward_type wt ON w.`wt_id` = wt.`id` WHERE un.`uid` = #{hid}

SELECT distribu_amount AS item_amount, m.name AS item_name, m.price as item_price FROM `medicine_distribution` md LEFT JOIN medicine m ON md.mid = m.mid WHERE md.hid = #{hid} GROUP BY m.`mid`, distribu_amount, hid, m.`name`, m.price, m.name

SELECT medicine_name AS item_name, price as item_price, rtn_amount AS item_amount FROM `medicine_return` mr LEFT JOIN medicine m ON m.`name` = mr.`medicine_name` WHERE mr.hid = #{hid} GROUP BY medicine_name, price, rtn_amount
